content: Do you know about the Revelare Academia? It's a trove of knowledge for everything in the universe, including fauna, flora, astronomy, geography, vinyl records, and literature.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在万象馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: One night, I heard them while I was standing here... {A灵光一现}Later, I found it was just the sound of a fish blowing bubbles.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在万象馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A笑眯眯}Every time I find myself standing in the Omni-Gallery, I get the feeling that all of the different wonders around me are whispering. It's the same feeling I used to get in the Academia's vast museum...
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在万象馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: When you visited the Omni-Gallery, did you hear those strange whispers...?
